Pickford kicked Manchester United defender Harry Maguire above the knee as the latter attempted a shot in the 60th minute of Evertons 3-1 loss.
The Everton keeper had spilt a freekick allowing Magui… [+1725 chars]

articles.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s Manchester United returned to winning ways amid reports Old Trafford heirachy has already lined up his replacement.
articles.content:

articles.description: Eden Hazard and Casemiro have both tested positive for the coronavirus, Real Madrid have announced.
articles.content:
